uk.blankaspect.common.json

Class JsonUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.blankaspect.common.json.JsonUtils

  • public class JsonUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods that relate to JSON.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static JsonValue readFile(java.nio.file.Path file)
      Reads the specified file, parses its content as JSON text and returns the resulting JSON value.
      static java.lang.String readText(java.nio.file.Path file)
      Reads the specified file and returns the resulting text, which is assumed to have the UTF-8 character encoding.
      static void writeFile(java.nio.file.Path file, JsonValue value)
      Writes the specified JSON value to the specified file as JSON text.
      static void writeFile(java.nio.file.Path file, JsonValue value, JsonGenerator generator)
      Writes the specified JSON value to the specified file as JSON text that is generated by the specified instance of JsonGenerator.
      static void writeText(java.nio.file.Path file, java.lang.String text)
      Writes the specified text to the specified file with the UTF-8 character encoding.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • readFile

        public static JsonValue readFile(java.nio.file.Path file)
                          throws java.io.IOException,
                                 JsonParser.ParseException
        Reads the specified file, parses its content as JSON text and returns the resulting JSON value.
        Parameters:
        file - the file that will be read and parsed as JSON text.
        Returns:
        the JSON value that results from parsing the content of file, if the file contains valid JSON text.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred when reading the file.
        JsonParser.ParseException - if an error occurred when parsing the content of the file.

      • readText

        public static java.lang.String readText(java.nio.file.Path file)
                                 throws java.io.IOException
        Reads the specified file and returns the resulting text, which is assumed to have the UTF-8 character encoding.
        Parameters:
        file - the file that will be read.
        Returns:
        the text content of file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred when reading the file.

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.nio.file.Path file,
                             JsonValue value)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the specified JSON value to the specified file as JSON text. The text is generated by a new instance of JsonGenerator that has default values for mode, indent increment and maximum line length. The file is written to a new file in the parent directory of the specified file, and the new file is then renamed to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to which the JSON text of value will be written.
        value - the JSON value whose JSON text will be written to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred when writing the file.

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(java.nio.file.Path file,
                             JsonValue value,
                             JsonGenerator generator)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the specified JSON value to the specified file as JSON text that is generated by the specified instance of JsonGenerator. The file is written to a new file in the parent directory of the specified file, and the new file is then renamed to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to which the JSON text of value will be written.
        value - the JSON value whose JSON text will be written to file.
        generator - the object that will generate the JSON text for value.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred when writing the file.

      • writeText

        public static void writeText(java.nio.file.Path file,
                             java.lang.String text)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the specified text to the specified file with the UTF-8 character encoding. The file is written to a new file in the parent directory of the specified file, and the new file is then renamed to the specified file.
        Parameters:
        file - the file to which text will be written.
        text - the text that will be written to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurred when writing the file.
